chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
x: nat

Goal:
power 0 x = 1

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
gcd.own_multiple : forall x p : nat, x = p * x -> x = 0 \/ p = 1
gcd.rem_2_is_0_or_1 : forall x : nat, gcd.rem x 2 = 0 \/ gcd.rem x 2 = 1
gcd.rem_2_mult : forall x y : nat, gcd.rem (x * y) 2 = 1 < -> gcd.rem x 2 = 1 /\ gcd.rem y 2 = 1
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Init.Nat.add x 1 : positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never
Nat.le_0_1 = Nat.lt_le_incl 0 1 Nat.lt_0_1 : 0 <= 1
mscal_1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, mscal m u 1 x = x
Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg : forall n m : nat, 0 <= n -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg' : forall n m : nat, 0 <= m -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
Nat.le_1_r : forall n : nat, n <= 1 < -> n = 0 \/ n = 1
Nat.zero_one : forall n : nat, n = 0 \/ n = 1 \/ 1 < n
Nat.eq_pred_0 : forall n : nat, Nat.pred n = 0 < -> n = 0 \/ n = 1
Nat.log2_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') => let o : x <= 0 \/ 0 < x := Nat.le_gt_cases x 0 in match o with | or_introl H => (fun lemma : Nat.log2 x = 0 => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.Equivalence_Transitive (Nat.log2 x) 0 lemma (Nat.log2 x') (Nat.log2 x') (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (Nat.log2 x'))) (Nat.log2_nonpos x H) ((fun lemma : Nat.log2 x' = 0 => Morphisms.trans_sym_co_inv_impl_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER Nat.eq_equiv) (Nat.log2 x') 0 lemma) (Nat.log2_nonpos x' ((fun lemma : x = x' => Morphisms.subrelation_proper Nat.le_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation)) x' x (RelationClasses...
plus_is_one : forall m n : nat, m + n = 1 -> {m = 0 /\ n = 1} + {m = 1 /\ n = 0}
times_zero_r : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall x : X, times x zero = zero
mscal_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u x : X), mscal m u 0 x = u
Nat.lt_0_1 = (fun lemma : 1 = 1 => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper Nat.lt_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation))) (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive 0) 1 1 lemma) Nat.one_succ (Nat.lt_succ_diag_r 0) : 0 < 1
scal_one : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (k : nat) (x : X), mscal sum zero k x = times (mscal sum zero k one) x
scal_one_comm : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (k : nat) (x : X), times (mscal sum zero k one) x = times x (mscal sum zero k one)
times_zero_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall x : X, times zero x = zero
scal_times : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (k : nat) (x y : X), mscal sum zero k (times x y) = times x (mscal sum zero k y)
Nat.divide_1_r_nonneg : forall n : nat, 0 <= n -> Nat.divide n 1 -> n = 1
Nat.one_succ = eq_refl : 1 = 1
binomial_n0 : forall n : nat, binomial n 0 = 1
Nat.pow_0_r : forall a : nat, a ^ 0 = 1
Record monoid_theory (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) : Prop := mk_monoid { monoid_unit_l : forall x : X, m u x = x; monoid_unit_r : forall x : X, m x u = x; monoid_assoc : forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z } Arguments monoid_theory [X]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments mk_monoid [X]%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
mult_is_one : forall n m : nat, n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
Nat.mul_eq_1 : forall n m : nat, n * m = 1 < -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
gcd.mult_is_one : forall p q : nat, p * q = 1 -> p = 1 /\ q = 1
Nat.eq_mul_1 : forall n m : nat, n * m = 1 < -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))
Nat.lt_1_r : forall n : nat, n < 1 < -> n = 0
Nat.mul_id_r : forall n m : nat, n <> 0 -> n * m = n < -> m = 1
Nat.mul_id_l : forall n m : nat, m <> 0 -> n * m = m < -> n = 1
Nat.log2_null : forall a : nat, Nat.log2 a = 0 < -> a <= 1
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
sum_0n_distr_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (b : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => times b (f i)) = times b (msum sum zero n f)
Nat.gcd_1_lcm_mul : forall n m : nat, n <> 0 -> m <> 0 -> Nat.gcd n m = 1 < -> Nat.lcm n m = n * m
Nat.log2_up_wd = let H : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq)) Nat.compare := fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => match Nat.compare_spec x x0 in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (c = (y ?= y0)) with | CompEq _ _ x1 => match Nat.compare_spec y y0 in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (x = x0 -> Eq = c) with | CompEq _ _ _ => fun _ : x = x0 => eq_refl | CompLt _ _ H1 => fun H2 : x = x0 => False_ind (Eq = Lt) ((fun H3 : x0 = y => (fun H4 : y = y0 => (fun H5 : y0 < y0 => Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.lt_irrefl H5) (Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.eq_lt (Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.eq_sym H4) H1)) (Nat.Private_OrderTac.T...
Nat.div_same : forall a : nat, a <> 0 -> a / a = 1
Nat.pow_1_l : forall a : nat, 1 ^ a = 1
